name: MoSCoW Template
description:
I really needed a template like this for a session I was running but I couldn't find one.


Must have, Should have, Could have, Won't have (MoSCoW) prioritisation is great to help clarify priorities/features/scope for a certain event or milestones like a launch, MVP or release.


Use sticky notes to run a collaborative remote whiteboard session with your team to make sure you are focusing on the right things. All instructions to run the session as well as some keyboard shortcuts are included.
